body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information. As part of the conversation, the customer should ask two questions.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should cover two or three topics, have back and forth between the parties, and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting LaserTech Support. My name is Mark Brooks. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great to meet you, Mary. Could you please provide me with your email address and phone number so we can assist you better?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my email address is mmartinez@example.com and my phone number is five five five, two three four, one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Mary. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I have recently visited your Laser Tag Arena, and I was quite disappointed with the product quality. Could you please explain why the vests were malfunctioning?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I apologize for the inconvenience, Mary. Our vests may sometimes encounter technical issues due to high usage, but we strive to fix them promptly. Is there anything else you would like to know or address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, can you provide me with information on the upcoming promotions at your Laser Tag Arena?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Of course, Mary. We have an exciting promotion coming up for the weekend where groups of four or more can enjoy a fifty percent discount on laser tag games. Thank you for your feedback and questions, Mary. We appreciate your time.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for contacting LaserTech Support. My name is Mark Brooks. May I have your name, please?
